info.institution: School of Computer Science and Information Systems, Birkbeck, University of London
info.occupation: About: George Papamarkos is a PhD student with the School of Computer Science and Information Systems at Birkbeck, University of London. His research interests include the analysis and integration of event condition action rules over semistructured data and in particular XML and RDF datasources for centralized and distributed environments, the definition and analysis of Event-Condition-Action rule languages, data exchange over peer-to-peer networks and semistructured data indexing in distributed environments
